fermi

Class GtProcess

  • java.lang.Object
    • fermi.GtProcess

  • public class GtProcess
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the basic of all fermi analysis. It can run "gtselect, gtmktime, gtbin, gtmodel, gtltcube, gtexpcube2, gtsrcmaps, gtlike" and so on. It has 3 constructors in it.

                                    java.util.List<java.lang.String> Args,
                                    java.lang.String output_directory,

        Parameters:
        command - Command line program, e.g.: "gtlike".
        Args - Arguments of the command line program.
        output_directory - Redirect the "stdout" to a file in this directory.
        err_directory - Redirect the "stderr" to a file in this directory.

      • newInstance

        public static GtProcess newInstance(java.lang.String command,
                                    java.util.List<java.lang.String> Args,
                                    java.lang.String output_directory,
                                    java.lang.String err_directory,
                                    java.lang.String out_file,
                                    java.lang.String err_file)
        Parameters:
        command - Command line program, e.g.: "gtlike".
        Args - Arguments of the command line program.
        output_directory - Redirect the "stdout" to a file in this directory.
        err_directory - Redirect the "stderr" to a file in this directory.
        out_file - File name of redirected stdout. e.g.: for "gtselect", the default value is "gtselect.out". Can be ignored.
        err_file - File name of redirected stderr. e.g.: for "gtselect", the default value is "gtselect.err". Can be ignored.
        Returns:
        Singleton, returns an instance of "GtProcess"
